description:
Learn how to edit photographs using Photoshop professionally. Brand NEW for 2016.

Learn how to professionally edit and retouch images in Photoshop using quick and effective methods to make your work stand out.

You will be learning employable skills top digital artists, retouchers and photographers use to make photographs look incredible.


Easy to follow. Beginner friendly + Project files included.

This course is easy to follow along. You will receive access to the same photo I edit in the lessons. You can copy my settings in each lesson to be an active learning and understand the skills taught in the course.

I have over 10 years experience in Photoshop retouching images, as well as a diploma in Graphic design. 

I will be teaching you the level of quality expected to work for clients such as Red Bull, Spotify, Carlsberg and more whom I have had the pleasure to work for.


Finally, you get my full attention on feedback. You are welcomed and encouraged to post your final result in the student discussion section where I will provide feedback to you.


What makes this course different?

  • You will be able to take these skills and apply them to future works.
  • All files are supplied
  • You learn easy skills which make your work look amazing
  • You won't forget the skills because they are easy to understand
  • Each editing skill is taught in its most efficient way to save you time and speed up your work flow
  • You will learn what professionals do as final touches to make their work pop and look extremely detailed.
  • These skills can be instantly applied to client work, earning you money and expanding your qualifications.



Take this course today and learn to edit and retouch raw images in Photoshop like a professional.
title: Photo Editing & Retouching Masterclass - Photoshop 2016
